name: tunelessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no tune and does not sound pleasant: She sang rather tunelessly. He began to whistle tunelessly. See
tuneless
More examplesFewer examplesA voice echoed tunelessly from the passage.He began to sing loudly and tunelessly against the roar of the engine. Michael, beside Stephen, began to hum tunelessly.
